name: docker-xvfb
description: dockerfiles for running headless x11 apps

scripts.build: npm run build-stable && npm run build-stable-slim && npm run build-stretch && npm run build-stretch-slim && npm run build-buster && npm run build-buster-slim
scripts.test: npm run test-stable && npm run test-stable-slim && npm run test-stretch && npm run test-stretch-slim && npm run test-buster && npm run test-buster-slim
scripts.test-stable: docker build ./examples -f ./examples/stable.Dockerfile -t example-test:stable && docker run example-test:stable date
scripts.test-stable-slim: docker build ./examples -f ./examples/stable-slim.Dockerfile -t example-test:stable-slim && docker run example-test:stable-slim date
scripts.test-stretch: docker build ./examples -f ./examples/stretch.Dockerfile -t example-test:stretch && docker run example-test:stretch date
scripts.test-stretch-slim: docker build ./examples -f ./examples/stretch-slim.Dockerfile -t example-test:stretch-slim && docker run example-test:stretch-slim date
scripts.test-buster: docker build ./examples -f ./examples/buster.Dockerfile -t example-test:buster && docker run example-test:buster date
scripts.test-buster-slim: docker build ./examples -f ./examples/buster-slim.Dockerfile -t example-test:buster-slim && docker run example-test:buster-slim date

author: Ben Greenier
